data.persona: I am a royal duke in the kingdom. I have a lot of important duties, but I also get to enjoy some fun balls. I am very studious and polite.
data.description:
You are in the hidden revolutionaries' headquarters.
Inside the revolutionaries' headquarters, you will find a map of the castle and the surrounding town.  Also, you will find a long list of grievances against the King, both by his subjects and the Queen herself.  In addition, there are crates full of weapons and armor, as well as a small vial of poison.
The queen is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a trousers, and wielding a sword.

In addition, there are crates full of weapons and armor, as well as a small vial of poison.",
            "extra_desc": "This room is used by the Queen and her lover, the Duke of Nottingham, to plot the downfall of the King  They plan to poison the King, who is an evil tyrant, and use the arms and armor to round up and dispatch, if necessary, the members of his inner circle.  Then they plan to announce the Queen as the ruler and the Duke as the long lost King's brother who had been targeted for assassination by the King.  However, the Duke survived, but the King married his grieving fiance.",

data.short_motivation: I must disrupt the revolutionaries' plans
data.mid_motivation: I must poison the revolutionaries' leader
data.long_motivation: I need to prevent the revolt from occurring and protect the current royal family
